verbs.description: During interviews on both NBC ’s Megyn Kelly Today and CBS This Morning on Monday , Barack Obama ’s former communications director Dan Pfeiffer [V: was] treated to numerous softball questions that allowed him to promote his new book , political podcast , and blast the Trump administration .
